data.text:
Sending our best wishes to Miles Chamley-Watson as you compete on Sunday! Miles, you are a phenomenal fencer, and Clearlight is thrilled to be part of your training and recovery routine. We’re cheering you on! Go get 'em, champ! Photo Courtesy: Miles Chamley-Watson Photo Credit: André Ferreira

We're excited to add the Sanctuary Studio Infrared Sauna to our commercial sauna lineup! Custom-built, this sauna is made from premium materials and designed for exceptional durability, making it an excellent addition to any commercial space. Perfect for sports teams, spas, and wellness centers, it promotes a sense of belonging and communal rejuvenation. Learn more at: https://lnkd.in/e5qZ7Z-j

This May, in conjunction with Mental Health Awareness Month, groundbreaking preliminary results from a UCSF clinical trial reveal a promising new approach to battling depression. By integrating psychotherapy sessions with heat exposure using The Curve™ Far Infrared Sauna Dome, participants experienced notable reductions in depressive symptoms. Dive deeper into this innovative study at the link below. https://lnkd.in/ePFyMPQZ

Warm Mother's Day greetings to all the incredible moms out there! May your day overflow with relaxation, joy, affection, and self-nurturing. We understand that balancing the demands of motherhood often leaves little space for personal time, but today is all about YOU! On that note, we reached out to the Clearlight team to explore how these remarkable women prioritize self-care amidst life's whirlwind.

Many thanks to NewsBreak for spotlighting Clearlight's HALO ONE®, AROMA ONE®, and Sanctuary 5 among their top picks for Mother's Day gifts. Mom deserves nothing but the finest, and this curated selection promises to bring joy to her heart. https://lnkd.in/ey455rSt

We are thrilled to unveil the Clearlight Sanctuary 5 Professional Full Spectrum Sauna—a cutting-edge addition to our commercial wellness lineup designed to elevate your space and enhance the experience for your clients. Priced at $8,799 (original price of $9,399), The Clearlight Sanctuary 5 Sauna is designed to withstand the demands of a commercial environment while delivering the ultimate wellness experience. Certified for continuous all-day operation, the Sanctuary 5 is the pinnacle of luxury and innovation. Elevate your commercial wellness space with the Clearlight Sanctuary 5 Professional Full Spectrum Sauna. Learn more at www.infraredsauna.com

Clearlight is thrilled to announce our participation in this year's CryoCON! Come and immerse yourself in the epitome of wellness experiences. Join us at Booth G-593 and Booth G-68 from March 1st to March 3rd. Dive deep into the ultimate wellness experience and discover the transformative power of Clearlight. We'll see you there!

In just a week, the holiday rush will be behind us, and we can resume our regularly scheduled program of self-care routines. What plans do you have to indulge in some well-deserved pampering post-holiday season? Photo courtesy of Free_Lit_Candles Ps. There's still time to shop our holiday sale and enjoy savings of up to $700 on all saunas and up to $500 on wellness add-ons. Learn more at http://infraredsauna.com

We know that preparing for the holiday season often comes with its fair share of stress. Here's to prioritizing self-care and discovering moments of comfort and joy with Clearlight.

We've been thoroughly enjoying our time at the A4M Longevity Fest in Las Vegas. Meeting new friends and discussing Clearlight and the groundbreaking realm of wellness has been incredible. If you stopped by our booth, remember to tag us in your photos or videos. Appreciate everyone who has connected with us. Stay tuned for more!
